decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials, including metal cladding and brickwork, and details of the proposed mortar mix to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Flood Risk Matrix, Block Plan, 17073-001, 17073-002, 17073-003, 17073-004, 17073/020 Rev P1, 17073/021 Rev P1, 17073-030 Rev P1, 17073/703 Rev P1, 17073/710 Rev P1, 17073/713 Rev P1, and 17073/762 Rev P1 received: 06/06/2018. Location Plan received: 08/06/2018. 17073/700 Rev P2, 17073/701 Rev P2, 17073/702 Rev P2, 17073/711 Rev P2, 17073/764 Rev P2, 17073/766 Rev P2, received: 27/07/2018. 17073/760 Rev P3, and 17073/765 Rev P3 received: 30/07/2018. 17073/712 Rev P2, 17073/720 Rev P3, 17073/730 Rev P4, 17073/732 Rev P3, 17073/759 Rev P3, 17073/761 Rev P3, 17073/763 Rev P3, and 17073/767 Rev P3 received: 01/08/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The roof lights shall be 'conservation style', installed to be flush with the existing roof slope.
description: Single storey rear extension and side extensions, additional side and roof fenestration and alterations to existing fenestration, flue pipe to main roof slope, and internal alterations to the house
